text: On a Misty Night is an album by saxophonist Junior Cook recorded in 1989 and released on the SteepleChase label.SteepleChase Productions ApS accessed April 18, 2017Junior Cook Leader Entry accessed April 18, 2017Junior Cook catalog accessed April 18, 2017Jazzlists: Junior Cook discography accessed April 18, 2017 == Track listing == # "On a Misty Night" (Tadd Dameron) – 6:09 # "Innocent One" (Mickey Tucker) – 5:53 # "Wabash" (Cannonball Adderley) – 7:25 # "You Know Who" (Bertha Hope) – 9:03 # "Make the Girl Love Me" (Arthur Schwartz, Dorothy Fields) – 10:14 # "My Sweet Pumpkin" (Ronnell Bright) – 10:15 # "Nothing Ever Changes" (Jack Segal, Marvin Fisher) – 8:15 # "I'll Go My Way by Myself" (Schwartz, Howard Dietz) – 7:27 == Personnel == *Junior Cook – tenor saxophone *Mickey Tucker – piano *Walter Booker – bass *Leroy Williams – drums == References == Category:Junior Cook albums Category:1990 albums Category:SteepleChase Records albums
title: On a Misty Night
